Marius is a skilled ranger known for his expertise in using the traditional bow and arrow, upon recruiting this companion, he starts with the active ability Binding Roots . Marius will also have the ability Hunter's Sense , a command ability that orders Marius to scan for enemies, loot, and plants in the Living Lands. Known as the best hunter and wilderness guide in the Living Lands, Marius has lived all over the Living Lands, but there is no place he truly calls home. Marius uses ancient Pargrunen stealth and survival techniques to gain the advantage over his foes, trapping them in gripping vines or disappearing from sight to ambush them with a silent attack. His senses are attuned to detect threats and objects scattered across the Living Lands. Companions are special NPCs that join the main character in their adventure. They have unique characteristics such as Background , Class , and Race—including their personal motivations and special Abilities . Well. Any friend of Kai's is definitely a person. How to Recruit & Where to Find Marius in Avowed Marius can be found speaking with Maili and Caldurn at the Grinning Balarok in the Underbelly in Paradis during the main quest, " An Untimely End ". Approach them to intervene in the conversation and choose the Noble Scion dialogue "Then you do know who I am. And you know whose ears I whisper into." to get the two to leave. Speak with Marius and he will thank you, choose the dialogue option "I need to find some assassins, and Kai tells me you're the best one for the job." to get him to talk about what he needs to do to help you. After the conversation ends, Maurius will join your party as one of your companions. Related Companion Quests for Marius in Avowed Marius has the following companion quests: Chorus of the Lost How to Unlock Companion Buffs of Marius in Avowed In Avowed , players can unlock companion buffs upon leveling up and spending time with them. Through story progression and speaking to them at every opportunity at the camp, a companion can provide buffs in the form of "training". When this occurs, a companion gives the player three options to choose from. (1) Adds a +2 to one core stat, (2) adds +2 to another core stat, and (3) gives +1 to each of the two core stats that the player trains in. Below you can find dialogue choices for Marius and which buffs will be provided: Avowed Marius's Training ++2 Dexterity : "Tell me how to be quicker, quieter, and more agile." +2 Constitution : "Show me how to survive conditions that would cripple the unprepared." +1 Dexterity +1 Constitution : "I trust your instincts. How about a little of everything?" Marius Avowed Ability Tree Marius joins the team with Binding Roots unlocked. For the rest of the Abilities, Marius has to level up to be granted Ability Points, which then, can be spent on either a new ability or upgrading an already purchased one. Each Ability or Upgrade cost 1 Ability Point. Binding Roots Active Duration : 8 Seconds Cooldown : 20 Seconds Marius uses his wilderness lore to Root an enemy in place for 8 seconds. Upgrades Constricting Roots Binding Roots deals Stun to trapped enemies. Grasping Roots Binding Roots traps multiple enemies in a small area of effect. Thorny Roots Binding Roots deals Bleed Accumulation to trapped enemies. Heart Seeker Active Duration : n/a Cooldown : 75 seconds Marius takes aim and fires a piercing shot that always hits its mark, passing through any obstacles in its path. Upgrades Twinned Shot After hitting the original enemy, Heart Seeker also hits the next closest enemy. Sharpshooter Increases the amount of damage dealt by Heart Seeker to enemies that are below 50% Health. Quick Draw Reduces the cooldown for Heart Seeker by 33%. Shadow Step Active Duration : n/a Cooldown : 60 Seconds Marius vanishes into a cloud of smoke, then reappears near an enemy and slashes them with his daggers. He repeats this up to 3 times. Upgrades Assassinate Shadow Step instantly kills the most Stunned enemies. Devastating Blow Increases the amount of damage done by Shadow Step in proportion to the enemy's missing health. Shadow Mastery Marius vanishes and strikes up to 6 times. Wounding Shot Passive Duration: n/a Cooldown : n/a Marius' attacks deal Bleed Accumulation. Upgrades Exposing Shots Marius' attacks reduce enemy Damage Reduction. Impending Shots Marius' attacks slow any hit enemies. Maiming Shots Marius' attacks reduce enemy damage. Avowed Marius Notes and Tips Notes, Tips, Trivia, and Other Information for Marius go here. Voice Actor : Scott Whyte Players can change Companion Outfits at the Main Camp tent in Party Camp. Side with the Steel Garrote to unlock the Achievement " Everyone Disliked That ". Unlocked all of Marius's abilities rewards the player with the Achievement "Bullseye".
